title: (x) Ortho Cast, Inc. - Chevalier Open {Santiago Fuentes Bo}
content:
I probably should know this, but What The Font chokes on outline faces. Any takers?   
   
(Maybe my client will let me design him a new logo, but until then...)

author: capthaddock

p a u l
